akas: Este hotel es un desastre Spain
Hotel Impossible: Extra Perks USA (recut version)
akas from release info: Este hotel es un desastre Spain
Hotel Impossible: Extra Perks USA (recut version)

1.title: Full Throttle in Sturgis
1.plot: Anthony is on a mission to save three struggling hotels near Sturgis, South Dakota. Will he have time to fix all the issues at these properties before hundreds of thousands of bikers come rolling into town?

2.title: Fire Island Meltdown
2.plot: At Clegg's Hotel on Fire Island in New York, Anthony meets a wary owner that needs to update his hotel, which has barely changed in 70 years. Can Anthony get through to the owner and make Clegg's the pride of Fire Island?

3.title: Lions, Tigers and Wasps, Oh My!
3.plot: Anthony visits Turpentine Creek Wildlife Refuge in Arkansas where lodging has taken a backseat to caring for the animals. If Anthony can help the owners focus on lodging, they could generate more money to save more animals.

4.title: Alarmed in Alaska
4.plot: Anthony meets the owner of Hooligan's Lodge in Soldotna, Alaska, who won't comply with the local fire code. Can Anthony give her a wake-up call before the place goes up in flames?

5.title: Rocky's Hot Tub Horror Show
5.plot: Anthony visits a struggling hotel in Albany, NY, and discovers filthy rooms and poor management. The owner wants to spend over a million dollars to rebuild, but Anthony tries to convince him to renovate instead.

6.title: Jersey Shore Uproar
6.plot: Anthony visits a not-so-fun motel in the resort town of Wildwood, New Jersey. After learning the business isn't really in financial trouble, Anthony discovers the owner is taking advantage of her underpaid general manager.

7.title: Lake Superior, Hotel Inferior
7.plot: Anthony visits Bayfield, WI, to help the struggling Greunke's First Street Inn and Restaurant. To get the inn running to its full potential, Anthony will have to convince the owner to agree to some major management changes.

8.title: Outer Banks-Ruptcy
8.plot: Anthony visits a beachfront motel in Cape Hatteras, NC, and meets the owner, who wants to sell the property before the bank forecloses. The asking price is unreasonable, but convincing the owner to come down will be a challenge.

9.title: Kentucky Conundrum
9.plot: Anthony visits Williamstown, KY, where an amazing replica of Noah's Ark draws hundreds of thousands of visitors. The nearby Sunrise Inn, however, is beset by so many problems that it needs a miracle to survive.

10.title: Desert Disaster
10.plot: Anthony travels to Palm Springs, CA, to help the Cambridge Inn. The inexperienced owner is running out of capital after just a few months, and her two general managers are constantly clashing and making poor decisions with guests.

11.title: Chaos on the Cape
11.plot: Anthony visits a motel in a beach town on Cape Cod where the employees are passionate about the property but the uninterested owner is looking to sell.

12.title: West Coast Wipe Out
12.plot: Anthony visits a hotel in San Clemente, CA, where the family of the deceased owner struggles to run the business in her honor.

13.title: Waterpark Bug-Out
13.plot: Anthony Melchiorri visits Ohio to help a dilapidated indoor waterpark and hotel with the worst bedbug infestation he's ever seen.

1.title: Gurney's Inn: Montauk, NY
1.plot: Anthony butts heads with the owners of Gurney's Inn, a Long Island hotel.

2.title: The Penguin Hotel, South Beach, Florida
2.plot: Anthony attempts to rescue the Penguin Hotel in South Beach, FL.

3.title: Hotel New Yorker: Miami, Florida
3.plot: Anthony travels to Miami to prevent a family-run hotel from closing.

4.title: The Purple Orchid Wine Country Resort & Spa
4.plot: Anthony helps The Purple Orchid Resort & Spa in California wine country.

5.title: The Ocean Manor Resort: Fort Lauderdale Fl
5.plot: Anthony tries to save the first high-rise resort built in Fort Lauderdale.

6.title: The Hotel Corpus Christi Bayfront: Corpus Christi, Tx
6.plot: Anthony goes to Corpus Christi, TX to save a neglected, dying hotel.

7.title: La Jolla Cove Suites: La Jolla, Ca
7.plot: Anthony goes to La Jolla to save an aging hotel by modernizing it's look.

8.title: Southern Oaks Inn; Branson, Mo.
8.plot: Anthony's in the showbiz hub of the Midwest to save the Southern Oaks Inn.

9.title: Fiddler's Inn Nashville, Tennessee
9.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

10.title: Newport Soa & Whirlpool Suites: Newport, RI
10.plot: Anthony tries to save the Newport Inn from a series of bad investments.

11.title: Dude Rancher Lodge: Billings, Mont.
11.plot: Anthony goes to the Dude Rancher Lodge to revive the historic hotel.

12.title: The Vermont Inn: Mendon, Vermont
12.plot: Anthony hopes to rebrand a bed-n-breakfast to save a family & business.

13.title: The Dream Inn: Daytona Beach, Florida
13.plot: The Dream Inn in Daytona may go under if Anthony can't turn things around.

1.title: Caribe Playa Beach Resort
1.plot: Anthony Melchiorri takes a laboring Puerto Rican hotel to a luxury resort.

2.title: Triangle T Ranch
2.plot: Anthony's in Arizona to renovate a historic ranch back to its glory days.

3.title: Maui Sunseeker Resort
3.plot: Anthony Melchiorri fights to save the largest gay owned hotel in Hawaii.

4.title: The Hotel Leger
4.plot: A whole town helps Anthony Melchiorri pull off his biggest transformation.

5.title: Glacier Bear Lodge
5.plot: Anthony Melchiorri heads to Alaska to fix a bear-infested fishing lodge.

6.title: Telemark Resort & Convention Center
6.plot: Anthony travels to northern Wisconsin to help the famed Telemark Resort.

7.title: Periwinkle Inn
7.plot: Anthony heads to Cape May, NJ to renovate the out of date Periwinkle Inn.

8.title: After Anthony
8.plot: Highlights of several episodes from season 1 are shown along with Anthony's commentary on how the hotels are doing months after his initial visit.

9.title: The Curve
9.plot: Can Anthony transform a Palm Springs motel into a trendy boutique hotel?

10.title: Casa Verde
10.plot: Can Anthony handle P.R.'s wild Casa Verde bar before the hotel owner wipes out?

11.title: Gardenia Resort
11.plot: Anthony heads to Jamaica to tackle the issues plaguing the Gardenia Resort.

12.title: Alpenhof Lodge
12.plot: Anthony Melchiorri helps a family struggling with an old ski lodge in CA.

13.title: Bromley Sun Lodge
13.plot: Anthony Melchiorri heads to Vermont to help the failing Bromley Sun Lodge.

14.title: The Western Riviera
14.plot: Anthony Melchiorri tries to help the sinking Grand Lake, CO and hotel.

1.title: Crack Vials & Denials
1.plot: Can Anthony Melchiorri save a historic Inn with crack vials and denials?

2.title: Greece Lightning
2.plot: Despite a ton of mold, can Anthony Melchiorri revitalize a Greek resort?

3.title: Fire Drill Flame Out
3.plot: Can Anthony Melchiorri fix this hotel before their fire alarms burn them?

4.title: Tropical Termites
4.plot: Anthony Melchiorri's cleaning trash and killing bugs at a Costa Rica resort

5.title: Shotgun Start
5.plot: Anthony Melchiorri must plan a surprise wedding and save a hotel as well.

6.title: Running on Empty
6.plot: Anthony Melchiorri tries to keep the oldest CA hotel open.

7.title: Boardwalk Gold
7.plot: Can Anthony fix a sinking boardwalk hotel that's real estate gold in Ocean City?

8.title: In the Doghouse
8.plot: Anthony powers up a growling owner & a pet-friendly hotel on Lake Michigan.

9.title: Don't Bug Me
9.plot: Can Anthony save the sinking Ritz Inn in Niagara Falls, Ontario?

10.title: Niagra Falls Down
10.plot: Can Anthony save the sinking Ritz Inn in Niagara Falls, Ontario?

11.title: Operation Sandy
11.plot: Trouble brews when Anthony visits NJ 9 months after Hurricane Sandy.

12.title: Operation Sandy
12.plot: Part 2 of 2, Anthony finds three new Seaside hotels in need of his help. With so many tasks at hand, and massive rainstorms delaying construction, can Anthony complete his mission at the Jersey Shore in time for July 4th weekend?

13.title: Crap Out
13.plot: Anthony heads to the growing casino town of Sparks, NV, near Reno, where the 92-room Victorian Inn is floundering & in bankruptcy. It's falling apart and the rooms reek. Can Anthony overhaul the owner's ways before she craps out?

1.title: Alaskan Heavyweights
1.plot: Anthony Melchiorri heads to Juneau, AK, to help a 100-yr-old hotel and bar. With a belligerent bar manager, feuding family owners, no security, a trespassing bear and a crushed designer, can he help keep this historic icon afloat?

2.title: Owner Overboard
2.plot: Anthony's in the Florida Keys, fishing capital of the world, but the waterfront Creekside Inn is sinking. After the owner/GM mistreats an undercover guest, Anthony tries to set them on course to fix the horrible customer service.

3.title: Mis-Fortune Hotel
3.plot: Anthony heads to ever-popular Las Vegas to repair the issues plaguing the Fortune Hotel. With a leaky ceiling and an owner who speaks no English, can Anthony bring good fortune back to this fractured business?

4.title: Breaking Point
4.plot: Anthony heads to Saint John, New Brunswick, Canada helping the historic Chipman Hill Suites. Things explode when an overly tyrannical owner threatens a housekeeper, who quits, pushing the overworked staff to its breaking point.

5.title: Hollywood Nightmare
5.plot: Anthony heads to Hollywood, CA to rehab the Liberty Hotel. With missing fire alarms, used syringes and plumbing & electrical issues, can Anthony save the hotel before the owners' potential happy ending becomes a tragedy?

6.title: Homestead Hoarders Gone Wild
6.plot: Anthony's in Homestead, FL to help the 150-room Floridian Hotel. With the brother owners out of touch, they're using the banquet hall to hoard old hotel supplies, furniture & trash. Can Anthony get it cleaned up with a new GM?

7.title: Temper Expectations
7.plot: Anthony heads to upstate New York to boost business for the dormant Catskills Mountain Lodge. When Anthony sees how the owner berates guests who leave bad feedback, can he change their ways before his temper kills his business?

8.title: Making Waves
8.plot: Anthony makes waves in Myrtle Beach, SC when he helps the Carnival Inn. The elevators & rooms look hideous and the manager is overwhelmed. When Anthony discovers the property is the most valuable part, will the owners sell it?

9.title: The Italian Scallion
9.plot: Anthony travels to picturesque Palermo, Sicily to help the Solunto Mare Hotel. Despite being close to the beautiful Mediterranean & world-class Sicilian cuisine, the hotel is ranked very low due to terrible service and bad food.

10.title: Swamped
10.plot: Anthony is in North Carolina to help the Peros family keep the High Meadows Inn & Nikola's Restaurant alive. The co-owner/father is a hopeless optimist, but Anthony gives him a needed reality check before he costs them everything.

11.title: Rat Race
11.plot: Anthony is down south in Atlanta, Georgia to help the University Inn at Emory. Despite being ideally situated the hotel is hounded by bad reviews, outdated rooms and a possible rat problem thanks to a dilapidated exterior.

12.title: Stormy Wedding
12.plot: Anthony is in beautiful Hood River, OR to help the Vagabond Lodge. Anthony transforms this picturesque property into a profitable event space, but can they pull off a wedding in just 48 hours, despite the looming storm clouds?

13.title: Airing the Family Business
13.plot: Voted 'Most Fun Town in America' by USA Today, Anthony is in Glenwood Springs, CO to help the stubborn owner of the 45-room Glenwood Motor Inn leave the laundry room behind, to get her into the office to properly manage the hotel.

1.title: Crash Course in Daytona
1.plot: Anthony is in Daytona Beach, FL, to save the historic 50-room Streamline Hotel. Can he leverage its NASCAR connection, steer the owner in a new direction and derail an inexperienced, hothead GM before the hotel crashes and burns?

2.title: Swinging for the Fences
2.plot: Anthony is in crisis mode when he finds out the 85-room Autoport Motel in State College, PA is in foreclosure. With the hotel's swinging reputation and lack of management, can he convince the bank the Autoport is worth saving?

3.title: Rotting Woodstock
3.plot: Anthony visits the cool and historic Woodstock, NY to get the struggling 35-room Woodstock Lodge back on its feet. But the owner's stubbornness and anger could force Anthony to leave before they can render any help at all.

4.title: Crappy Management
4.plot: Anthony is in Crookston, MN to help the struggling 73-room Crookston Inn & Convention Center. Frustrations mount when Anthony forces a surly manager to own up to a disgusting bathroom, and suggests the owners fire another.

5.title: Super Nova Scotia
5.plot: Anthony is in Canada's Cape Breton, Nova Scotia to help re-brand the 70-room Hearthstone Inn. Can Anthony avoid disaster with an unkempt exterior, a non-existent branding plan and tense, lost leadership before everything implodes?

6.title: Masters of My Domain
6.plot: Anthony is in Aiken, SC, 30 minutes from Augusta National Golf Club, home of The Masters, to help a struggling 34-room family hotel. Can he convince the stubborn owner to change her ways and the hotel's name to help save it?

7.title: Resort to Spanking
7.plot: Anthony is in the beautiful lake town of Manson, WA at the struggling Mountain View Lodge. With a passive aggressive owner with a lack of control issues, and a tourist town also struggling, Anthony has his work cut out for him.

8.title: Packing Heat
8.plot: Anthony heads to the coast of Maine to help the Vacationland Inn, where he needs to school the owners & the pistol-packing managers who want to buy the hotel on the lack of hotel security and treating their employees better

9.title: Clearing the Heir
9.plot: Anthony Melchiorri heads to Moclips, WA, to help the family-run Ocean Crest Resort. With guest rooms reminiscent of a 70s sitcom and an heir who seems completely clueless, Anthony needs to prepare the next generation.

10.title: Sleeping on the Job!
10.plot: Anthony is dogging the owner of the CitiGarden Hotel in San Francisco, but with disgusting guest rooms, an under-performing GM & a sexy surprise, he'll need to overcome a lot of negative reviews to create a new brand of success.

11.title: Getting Screwed
11.plot: When Anthony hits the booming oil town of Williston, ND, and sees the Missouri Flats Inn isn't treating its guests well, he decides to do something he's never done before.

12.title: The Big Sleasy
12.plot: Anthony visits a boutique hotel in historic and tourist heavy New Orleans, and finds mistreated employees and ridiculous cost-cutting policies. Can Anthony urge a stubborn owner to sell the hotel to her sons for a fresh start?

1.title: Fix Your Kicks on Route 66
1.plot: Anthony road trips along one of America's most iconic highways, historic Route 66, to help 3 properties. He visits an outdated motel, a former bordello that's a restored inn, a struggling RV park and various roadside attractions.

2.title: Bite Me
2.plot: Before Anthony can inspect the 40-room Country Barn Motel in NH, he calls in help to exterminate bed bugs. The 3 owners argue & don't want to hear what Anthony has to say, but this place is about to turn back into an actual barn.

3.title: Not ANice Hotel
3.plot: Anthony visits Orlando, where he discovers that the 350-room Anice Inn & Suites is anything but nice. After finding killer bees, bedbugs, mold & feral cats, can Anthony force an owner to invest in fixing all the issues?

4.title: To Be or Not to Be
4.plot: Anthony is in Utah, home of the Shakespeare Festival, to help the struggling Stratford Court Hotel, sitting at the center of the town. With help from the community, can Anthony prevent a Shakespearean tragedy at this hotel?

5.title: Hershey Addiction
5.plot: Anthony is in Hershey, PA, mecca for thrill-riders & chocoholics. But the GM of the struggling Simmons Motel has a more serious addiction, so they hold an intervention to help him see he's hurting the business and his family.

6.title: Dirty Water Falls
6.plot: Anthony is in Niagara Falls, NY, at the 55-room Waldorf Niagara Hotel. The owner's frugality has affected the hotel, from soaked carpets & bed bugs to fire safety issues. Can Anthony help this hotel before new ones open nearby?

7.title: Sweating Bullets in Panama
7.plot: Anthony heads to Panama's beaches to help the struggling 48-room Las Olas Resort. After giving the pool bar and restaurant much needed facelifts, can Anthony improve the hotel enough to get the hotel out of 15 years of debt?

8.title: See Smell by the Seashore
8.plot: Anthony is in Virginia Beach, Virginia, at the 24-room, pet-friendly Sea Shell Motel. Despite being steps away from the boardwalk & beautiful beach, the business is failing and they have terrible online reviews.

9.title: Waterpan-Gate
9.plot: Anthony visits the Capital Plaza Hotel in Frankfort, KY, oversized & on the brink of imploding. Employee morale, maintenance issues & top-heavy leadership come to a head when he finds pans of water dangerously left in the ceiling.

10.title: Spinning Out of Control
10.plot: Anthony is in historic Galena, Illinois, where the Grant Hills Motel is stuck in the past. When the owner and her sister refuse to work together, Anthony resorts to bringing a therapist in to get the sisters communicating again.

11.title: A Tall Odor in Myrtle Beach
11.plot: Anthony is in Myrtle Beach at the moldy, foul-smelling Lancer Motel, and he doesn't believe in the owner's son who's hoping to run the business. After putting employees at risk of a bed bug infestation, can Anthony trust the new regime?

12.title: Underwear, Under Where?
12.plot: Anthony heads to Gatlinburg, TN, home of Smoky Mountain National Park, to help the 120-room Brookside Resort. It is under-staffed, has horrid online reviews, inexperienced managers and he finds pink underwear under a mattress.

13.title: Ex Marks the Spot
13.plot: Anthony is in Maine helping the historic 33-room Charles Inn. When the owner's ex boyfriend creates a volatile work environment, Anthony needs to diffuse the situation before the hotel ends up like their rocky relationship.

1.title: Hostel Takeover
1.plot: Anthony visits the Gardner Hotel in El Paso, TX, a historic hotel turned partially into a hostel. After Anthony is stunned by the GM & accidentally discovers a female guest in the communal shower, can he address the severe issues?

2.title: Futility Closet
2.plot: Anthony is in Rhode Island to help the 34-room Sandy Shore Motel. He clashes with a cheap owner who bullies his staff, and has neglected the smelly utility closet for years. Giant mold colonies are growing everywhere.

3.title: Blind Faith
3.plot: Anthony visits the 228-room Winter Haven Suites in Florida, close to Orlando's major theme parks. Can Anthony rebuild the hotel's weak leadership and show the visually impaired owner the path to success?

4.title: Rocky Relationships
4.plot: Anthony visits scenic Libby, Montana, to save two motels that are struggling due to personal issues within the family that owns them.

5.title: Branson Misery
5.plot: Anthony visits the 50-room Colonial Mountain Inn in the tourist-friendly Branson, MO. With a family feud, a contractor clash and a utility closest that is a death trap, will Anthony be able to fix the Colonial Mountain Inn?

6.title: Boss's Time Out
6.plot: Anthony visits Bossier City, Louisiana, to help the struggling Bossier Inn and Suites. The owners have mismanaged the property and are accused of abusing their staff. Can Anthony find a solution before the owners kick him out?

7.title: Malpractice in Hawaii
7.plot: Anthony visits beautiful Kauai, Hawaii, to help the Kauai Inn. Owners Tom and Jamie don't trust their son and daughter-in-law to manage the hotel on their own. Can Anthony convince the reluctant owners to hand over the reins?

8.title: Top Ten Meltdowns
8.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

9.title: The Pain in Maine
9.plot: Anthony visits the struggling Trade Winds Inn in historic Rockland, Maine. The waterfront hotel has a ton of potential, but Bob is not ready to let his children take over leadership of the business.

10.title: Going Poconowhere
10.plot: Anthony visits The Bradford Inn in Towanda, PA, where the owner's inexperience and lack of motivation are tearing his relationships and business apart. Anthony must get through to him before he loses more than just his business.

11.title: Tiny Horse, Big Problems
11.plot: Anthony visits the Big Bear Motel in Cody, Wyoming. The owners' daughter is eager to take over, but she has a lot to learn about running a hotel. Can Anthony help the owners seamlessly pass the property to the next generation?

12.title: Funeral Home Impossible
12.plot: Anthony visits the Posada de San Juan in California where the owner runs the property that her late husband built. The hotel desperately needs a facelift, but that won't happen until control is passed to her children.

13.title: Anchorless in Anchorage
13.plot: Anthony visits Anchorage Lofts in Alaska. It has a pool area being used as storage space, a restaurant that doesn't make enough money and upper-management issues. Can Anthony help the owners before their investment goes belly-up?

-1.title: 5 Star Secrets: Wowie Maui
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.title: Hotel Impossible
plot: Anthony Melchiorri travels to help inexperienced hotel owners save their hotels from closing down.
